/* PopupMapper.selectPopup */
select count(1) over() as total_count , row_number() over(order by board_id desc ) as rnum , tb.* from ( select popup_id , popup_title , popup_link , popup_close1 , popup_close2 , popup_height , popup_width , popup_startdate , popup_enddate , created_id , DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime , updated_id , DATE_FORMAT(updated_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_datetime from tb_popup where popup_id like concat(#{id},'%') )tb where 1 = 1
